_header: In hand and heart true love keep

PierpontAcc698.Transcription:
In hond and [herte] true loue keepeif hart do falle but loue will
                    weyethen hart in hand doth not a misethen think of her that gaue you
                    thisor sent you this chouse you which
PierpontAcc698.Note:
Added to upper outer margin by a hand of the sixteenth century; ends
                    ‘amen Robert [?S or H].
